title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate power solution for your vehicle. With a powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter can start up to 10L diesel engines and any gasoline engines in just minutes. Whether you're dealing with a dead battery or need to jump-start a large engine, this jump starter has got you covered.

Equipped with a high capacity 27800mAh battery, this jump starter can start all 12V cars, motorcycles, ATVs, lawn mowers, and more up to 40 times on a full charge. It's perfect for any emergency situation or outdoor adventure.

Safety is our top priority. The AVAPOW jump starter features intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection. The sturdy and durable jumper clamp ensures a secure connection, while the indicator and buzzer provide clear operation guidance.

But that's not all. This jump starter is also a portable car power supply with dual USB 3.0 output ports, allowing you to charge your devices up to 75% faster than ordinary power banks. It's compatible with almost all USB charging devices, making it a versatile and convenient companion.

Need a light in the dark? The AVAPOW jump starter comes with a multifunctional LED light featuring three working modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe. It's the perfect emergency tool for camping, outdoor activities, and travel.

In the box, you'll find everything you need - the portable battery starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and user manual. Plus, our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you.

Don't get stranded on the road again. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter and enjoy peace of mind wherever you go. Please note that no adapter is included, but you can use any USB type charger to charge the jump starter.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate automotive power solution. With a powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter can start any gasoline engine and even 10.0L diesel engines in just minutes. Its 27800mAh capacity and two USB charge ports ensure that you can charge your devices anywhere, anytime. The compact design and rugged construction make it perfect for on-the-go use. Equipped with intelligent protection systems and metal clamps, this jump starter is not only powerful but also safe and reliable. The upgraded fast charging technology ensures a 75% faster charging speed compared to ordinary power banks. With its multifunctional LED light and three working modes, it can be used as an emergency tool or for outdoor activities. You'll receive the jump starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and user manual in the package. Trust AVAPOW for all your automotive power needs.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - the ultimate power solution for your vehicle. With a peak current of 4000A, this jump starter can effortlessly start any 10.0L diesel engine or gasoline engine in just a matter of minutes. Its powerful 27800mAh battery pack ensures a reliable performance every time.

Not only does this jump starter offer exceptional power, but it also comes with a range of features to enhance your experience. The compact design allows for easy portability, making it perfect for use anywhere. The type-C input and output enable seamless charging and compatibility with various devices.

Safety is a top priority with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. The metal clamps provide durability and prevent breakage, ensuring long-lasting use. Intelligent protection systems, such as short circuit and reverse connection prevention, guarantee a worry-free operation. The jumper box also includes a prompt indicator and buzzer for correct usage.

This jump starter goes beyond its primary function, doubling as a portable car power supply with a high capacity of 27800mAh. The dual USB 3.0 output ports deliver fast charging speeds, 75% faster than ordinary power banks. From smartphones to tablets, cameras, and more, this jump starter is compatible with a wide range of USB charging devices.

Equipped with a multifunctional LED light, this jump starter provides three working modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe. Perfect for emergencies, camping, outdoor activities, and travel, the super bright LED lights offer convenience and visibility during nighttime.

With your purchase, you'll receive the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and user manual. Plus, our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you.

Don't miss out on this powerful and reliable automotive jump starter. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the convenience and peace of mind it brings. Please note that no adapter is included, as your cell phone USB type charger can be used to charge the jump starter.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger

Description: Our AVAPOW 4000A Jump Starter is a Supersafe and reliable automotive jump starter offering the users maximum power. This jump box has a 4000A peak current. You can use it to start 10.0L diesel engine and any gasoline engines in a few minutes. The 4000A Peak 12V car battery pack jumper booster comes with 88Wh high capacity and portable battery charger.It designed with 27800mAh and two USB charge ports. This automotive battery jumper pack can be used anywhere for its compact body.It is equipped with type-C input and output, which enables it to supports type-C charging USB. The other outstanding thing about this best battery jump starter for the large engine is its ruggedness and super security. This jump starter cables are all made of metal clamps to prevent them from breaking in the long run.

POWERFUL & LARGE CAPACITY - AVAPOW car jump starter provides up to 4000 peak current, 27800mAh capacity can start all 12V cars (Including hybrid power), motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, snowmobiles, etc. easily in just a few minutes. (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel) - up to 40 times on a full charge.

INTELLIGENT PROTECTION - With intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature and reverse connection. The jumper clamp is designed to be sturdy and durable, and the cable of sufficient length is more convenient to use. The jumper box has a prompt indicator and a buzzer to indicate correct operation.

UPGRADED FAST CHARGING - Not only a lithium car starter, but also a portable car power supply with a high capacity of 27800mAh. It uses dual USB 3.0 output ports (USB 1: 5V /3A 9V /2A 12V /1.5A; USB 2: 5V / 2.4A and the Charging speed is 75% faster than ordinary mobile power. Compatible with almost all USB charging devices, including mobile phones and tablets, cameras, kindle, etc.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LED LIGHT - This car battery jump starter features three working modes of built-in light (flashlight/SOS/strobe), which can be used as an emergency tool. Super bright LED lights provide more convenience for night use. This multifunctional flashlight is perfect for camping, outdoor, emergency, travel, etc.

WHAT YOU GET - 1 X Portable Battery Starter,1 X Jumper Cables,1 X USB-C Cable, 1 X Cigarette Lighter Converter, 1 X Carry Case,1 X User Manual, and professional 24-hour online after-sales team for any issue. Tips: No adapter included (All your cell phone USB type charger could be used to charge the jump starter.).
